metadata.title: CVE-2019-8331 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Bootstrap before 3.4.1 and 4.3.x before 4.3.1, XSS is possible in the tooltip or popover data-template attribute.

criterions.comment: twitter-bootstrap3 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.1+dfsg-1').
twitter-bootstrap4 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.1+dfsg2-1').
